law.catch_line: A claim for refund may be filed with the tax collector who collects the tax, fee, charge, interest, ...
law.text:
A claim for refund may be filed with the tax collector who collects the tax, fee, charge, interest, or penalty by a claimant who:
Erroneously pays to a county or municipal corporation a greater amount of tax, fee, charge, interest, or penalty than is properly and legally payable; or
Pays to a county or municipal corporation a tax, fee, charge, interest, or penalty that is erroneously, illegally, or wrongfully assessed or collected in any manner.
